name: pwa-jate
description: A Progressive Web App (PWA) text editor.

scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run server" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.start: npm run install_all && npm run build && npm run start_server
scripts.build_client: cd client && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.install_all: npm install && npm run install_client && npm run install_server
